Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

We aren't very close to you.=C2=A0We had Tom Lynch come here from NH last y=
ear in June. He did not get much in the way of solid proof. HOWEVER, he'd h=
eard parts of what I have discussed here in this message, over the phone wi=
th us. 
=C2=A0
We did get positive Mel meter,( EMF,) IR=C2=A0Thermometer an=
d=C2=A0KII meter readings. We used an, danged if I can think of the name, i=
t uses predictive voice and begins with an O. We used night cameras, EVP re=
corders, Frank's boxes, etc.
=C2=A0
I usually don't have trouble talking to=
 or removing spirits/ crossing them over. This is just so different than an=
ything else I've experienced. We have done the only talking about "it" in t=
he car thing or away from home but it makes no difference.Maybe we are focu=
sing on it too much lately. We aren't sleeping well. We are tired. We are a=
ggravated as a result and Jay works in a very high pressure job and needs t=
o be on top of things. 
=C2=A0
So far, it's quiet today.
=C2=A0

Take every=
 chance you get because some things only happen once...

--- On Mon, 4/26/1=
0, M.A.P.S. <maps_paranormal2010@...> wrote:


From: M.A.P.S. <maps_p=
aranormal2010@...>
Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: I need help, please.
To: EV=
P-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Monday, April 26, 2010, 9:19 PM


=C2=A0 



We=
 are located in southern missouri, and will travel...lol Wow, and more wow'=
s.... where are you located? Have you tried to not talk about "it" while yo=
u are in the house? That way you are not giving it attenion...

--- In EVP-=
ITC@yahoogroups .com, AzureDamselfly <azuredamselfly@ ...> wrote:
>
> Hi!
>=
 =C3=82=C2=A0
> It happens always at night and at different times during th=
e day. Rain, shine, snow does not matter. Today the diningroom lights were =
turning off and on, we have new electrical and did all of those checks nece=
ssary. 
> =C3=82=C2=A0
> The pattern recently is this: We go to bed . We ma=
y or may not see a dark shadow move in the bedroom. Within 10 minutes the b=
anging begins. It sounded last night as if things were being thrown on the =
floor on my side of the bed. Nothing had fallen. Then it moves all around t=
he room hitting the mirrorred door, the tv, the next wall, then Jay's bedsi=
de table and ends with the window above our heads. A full circle. We told i=
t to go. It got quiet for 4 hours. Usually it just continues and gets loude=
r. It also seems to like banging the door and all 4 walls of the closet. I =
have been sleeping with a fan on to drown it out and as a result it has got=
ten much louder. 
> =C3=82=C2=A0
> HAha as I type this it is banging behind=
 my head on the china cabinet. When I came downstairs early this a.m. it ba=
nged 3 walls, in succession, as loudly as it could not 2 feet behind me. It=
 is now banging on the case of my PC, my monitor, the dinigroom table and t=
he ceiling...brother, it never gives up.=C3=82=C2=A0 It walks up and down t=
he stairs, scars the bejeezuz outta our 14 yr old cat, bangs the front door=
, the porch ceiling and walks overhead in the attic over the 2nd floor bedr=
oom. 
> =C3=82=C2=A0
> We know the other spirits who reside with us, this o=
ne we don't. Oh yes, sometimes we get a very foul odor associated with it. =
( heavy testosterone/ chicken soup/ dirty sweatsocks smells) Other times we=
 smell heavy Old Spice over our faces in the bed.
> =C3=82=C2=A0
> It also =
seems to thrive on negativity. We work very hard to contain that in our hom=
e, the negativity I mean. If Jay & I have an argument it REALLY gets active=
. Makes us wonder if moving is the solution.
> =C3=82=C2=A0
> BTW, we have =
so many EVP's it isn't funny. One of my deceased son, Jay's Dad, and someth=
ing very garbled. The one of my son is VERY clearly stating his name. THAT =
was the best! 
> =C3=82=C2=A0
> Keep the ideas and suggestions coming, plea=
se! 
> =C3=82=C2=A0
> Thanks much! 
> Annie & Jay C.
> =C3=82=C2=A0
> I app=
reciate your response. Where is MAPS located?
> =C3=82=C2=A0
> 
> 
> Take e=
very chance you get because some things only happen once...
> 
> --- On Mon=
, 4/26/10, M.A.P.S. <maps_paranormal201 0@...> wrote:
> 
> 
> From: M.A.P.S=
. <maps_paranormal201 0@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: I need help, please.
=
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
> Date: Monday, April 26, 2010, 11:41 AM
> 
=
> 
> =C3=82=C2=A0 
> 
> 
> 
> Hi annie,
> 
> We just joined this group, and=
 I would like to say that with your problem, pay close attenion to the time=
s that this happens and the weather. you might have a residual huanting, if=
 that is the case you wont get rid of it and it wont talk to you, because i=
t wont know that you are there.. hope I am not repeating imformation. ..Hav=
e a great day
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com, "Azure D" <azuredamself=
ly@ ...> wrote:
> >
> > I am Annie. I have not written much but have visaul=
ly followed this group over the past year. I have much experience in the re=
alm of the paranormal. 
> > 
> > Here is the issue. Our home has an inhabit=
ant that we cannot seem to remove. It does not speak to us on the frank's b=
ox nor will it communicate through either me or my partner, Jay. We are bot=
h mediums. It slams and bangs in the house almost ceaselessly at night. It =
hits the walls, windows, the tv, the bedside tables and the doors. I am at =
a loss as to how to otherwise communicate because as I said with the 2 boxe=
s we have, it won't speak.
> > 
> > I am open to any and all suggestions. W=
e have told it to go, tried many different suggested rituals and to no avai=
l. It will go quiet for a day to three days after ritual work but begins ag=
ain, only louder.
> > 
> > Please, if anyone can help or direct us to someo=
ne who can I would be most grateful.
> > 
> > Sincerely,
> > Annie & Jay C.=

> >
>
